name: Zepball Deluxe
description:
Control the gold paddles using the keyboard. Each time the ball hits a paddle the player receives one point.

Each of the 20 stages has a points goal, and when the goal is met you will proceed to the next stage.

The stages become more complex as you progress, increasing the number of paddles, barriers, and balls. Eventually obstructive gray paddles are introduced which move independently and do not add to your score.
